item.title: Solving a multi-knapsack problem iteratively
item.description: Goal Distribute the given boxes into a hundred trucks so that the lightest and heaviest have the smallest possible weight difference. Background You are a great tycoon who needs to move materials, equipment and gold from Chicago to New York to build your next sky scraper. You have a convoy of 100 trucks and a variable amount of boxes to move. Unfortunately there are unscrupulous villains who would like to steal the gold from one of your shipments.
